show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
The Project Censored Show on Pacifica Radio; today’s show we speak with Code Pink’s Dana Balicki and Media Roots’ Abby… Martin about the Occupy Movement for 2012; we hear from Steve Zeltzer of Work Week Radio; for the last part of this week’s program we are joined by independent journalist and analyst Stephen Lendman, author of How Wall St.
Fleeces America, on how we might stop the march to war on Iran.
